subject: NCAA Basketball Tournament (Men)
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Derrick Williams’s 3-point play with 9.6 seconds left sent the No. 5 Wildcats past the No. 4 Longhorns after Texas’ last-second scramble to the basket came up short.
snippet: Derrick Williams’s 3-point play with 9.6 seconds left sent the No. 5 Wildcats past the No. 4 Longhorns after Texas’ last-second scramble to the basket came up short.
